0: Police say a suspect is in custody after the shooting of a student on the first day of classes at a high school near Baltimore. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Baltimore County police say the Perry Hall High School student was flown to a hospital after being shot Monday morning. Police say a suspect was taken into custody after the shooting but did not provide additional details. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR WJZ-TV showed video of a shirtless male with his hands behind his back being put into a police cruiser.
